publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1089.1 Carolyn Leckie: Zero Waste-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1089) in the name of Shiona Baird, insert at end "and, in line with a zero waste approach, calls on the Executive to recognise the environmental damage done to the community of Greengairs by its present policies on waste and honour its commitment to the community of Greengairs by halting all landfill and opencast developments immediately." Supported by: Tommy Sheridan*, Colin Fox*
